name: Jumpinite - Endless Jump
description:
Those cute little heroes need you more than ever before!

Choose your character and make it jump... high, endlessly!
Only you have the skills to do it. Avoid obstacles and beat the highscore!

Collect points to unlock all heroes and take them to infinity. Have fun!

Game features:
- Many cute characters to unlock.
- Great graphics.
- Easy to play / hard to master!
- Very satisfying music and souds.
- Too much cuteness!
